title: Do we get more or less BE than before? Or is it pretty much the same?
body: I hear people complaining about BE on the boards. People complaining about the amount we get, and how the new system isn't good. I can't really tell if this is true or not, as I hardly play at all. Can anyone confirm if we get more BE, less BE, or the same amount of BE? And can you also provide a comparison with the old system?

replies.body: [Here's a great post from a Rioter that explains that, yes, you do gain slightly more BE than in the old system](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/developer-corner/hAaYMrEs-leveling-and-rewards-early-impressions-and-adjustments). That being said, BE is also *worth* more now, so you're actually getting a decently sized advantage.

Chermorg with the assist! That posts sums up a lot of what's going on with all the changes, but overall, most players are slowly finding out that the new system helps deliver more BE than the old IP system, especially when you factor in how many more chests and capsules you get for free now!
